column4: is it possible to downgrade back to 11.04? i upgraded to 11.10 last night and now about the only thing i can even open is firefox
is it possible to switch back to 11.04? or do i have to uninstall ubuntu completely and start completely over?
im new to ubuntu, only been using it for about a month. by chance did ubuntu make an auto back up and if so how do i find it to revert back to 11.04?
no. you need to re-install. there is no way back otherwise.
